title: Hang with me at Lunar Park?
body: So I'm planning to go to Lunar Park next Saturday for the OPL championship final and hang around in the park.I'm kind of a loser so having no friends to hang with atm,looking for other people in the same situation.Gonna get a ride tickets for myself to play around during the day.Anyone in?

replies.body:
Hey man, I wish i was in Sydney for the final (although i dont follow oce pro circuit) to chill with you! Sadly i live in NZ. Im sure you'll find someone to hang around with on the forums, if not just strike up a convo with another league nerd on the day, you'd be surprised by how many people would be glad to talk about league and hang out! 
Good luck bro!
